text: Polonia-Express is an East German film directed by Kurt Jung-Alsen. It was released in 1957. ==Cast== * Alice Graf as Hella Merkel * Horst Schön as Fritz Marr * Gerhard Bienert as Wilhelm Merkel * Martin Flörchinger as Ralow * Rudolf Ulrich as Althoff * Hans Klering as Schwerte * Harry Gillmann as Riemer * Hans-Peter Minetti as Lehnert ==References== ==External links== * Category:1957 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:German black-and-white films Category:Films directed by Kurt Jung- Alsen
title: Polonia-Express
